extendedInfo.description: Earn money by unlocking Mobile phones on the go!Unlimited unlocking via IMEI for the following models:AlcatelBlackberryDoro (new)Huawei (modems)Pantech (new)ZTENo need to purchase any unlocking credits!Just enter the phones imei and get the unlock code instantly displayed on your sreenPhone Unlocker App provides you with the the code required to remove the network lock from your handset.This enables you to insert any sim card into your handset and make phone calls on all available Networks in your country or worldwide.Step#1: Simply download and install the app.Step#2: Enter your details into the Phone Unlocker App registration page.Step#3: Enter your details along with the unique activation code sent to you via email.Step#4: Enter the phones unique IMEI into the app (serial number found on the label under the battery or by typing *#06#) and you will receive the unlock code instantly.Step#5: Enter the unlock code into the handset using the instructions that are mailed to your registered email address.Please note:Please check your spam folders if you do not receive activation details within 10 minutes!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!You must only enter the unlock code once. If this fails then insert another code if this is provided.Do not enter the code more than 9 times! Some handsets have a counter which may disable or block the handset after 10 wrong attempts.Disclaimer:By entering the unlock code into your handset you may void the phones warranty so again check the relevant manufacturers terms and conditions.Jic Electronics Ltd takes no responsibility for any damage or data loss that may occur to your mobile phone by entering the unlock code or using any software provided. Unlocking is at your own risk.Our Phone Unlocker App and API is licensed to the registered users handset.Any illegal use of our product or API will result in the account being terminated.Follow us on Twitter for latest news: @jictech
